queries.queryString:
_index=sec_record*
| timeslice 1h
| count by _timeslice

_index=sec_record*
| timeslice 1h
| count by _timeslice, metadata_vendor, metadata_product
| transpose row _timeslice column metadata_vendor, metadata_product

_index=sec_record*
| where isValidIP(srcDevice_ip)
| timeslice 1h
| count by srcDevice_ip
| order by _count
| limit 10

_index=sec_record*
| where isValidIP(dstDevice_ip)
| timeslice 1h
| count by dstDevice_ip
| order by _count
| limit 10

_index=sec_record*
| where !isEmpty(http_url_rootDomain) and http_url_entropyRootDomain > 3
| count by http_url_rootDomain, http_url_entropyRootDomain
| order by _count asc
| where _count = 1

_index=sec_record*
| where srcDevice_ip matches "{{ip}}" or device_ip matches "{{ip}}"
| where !isEmpty(dstDevice_ip)
| count by dstDevice_ip
| order by _count

_index=sec_record*
| where srcDevice_ip matches "{{ip}}"
| where !isEmpty(srcDevice_ip)
| count by srcDevice_ip
| order by _count

_index=sec_record*
| timeslice 1h
| where dstDevice_ip matches "{{ip}}" or srcDevice_ip matches "{{ip}}"
| where !isEmpty(srcDevice_ip) and !isEmpty(dstDevice_ip) and !isEmpty(dstDevice_ip_countryCode)
| count by _timeslice, dstDevice_ip_countryCode
| transpose row _timeslice column dstDevice_ip_countryCode

_index=sec_record*
| where dstDevice_ip matches "{{ip}}" or srcDevice_ip matches "{{ip}}"
| where !isEmpty(srcDevice_ip) and !isEmpty(dstDevice_ip)
| count by dstPort
| order by _count

_index=sec_record*
| where dstDevice_ip matches "{{ip}}" or srcDevice_ip matches "{{ip}}"
| where !isEmpty(srcDevice_ip) and !isEmpty(dstDevice_ip) and !isEmpty(dns_query)
| count by dns_query
| order by _count

_index=sec_record*
| timeslice 1d
| where metadata_product = "Office 365"
| count by metadata_deviceEventId, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column metadata_deviceEventId

_index=sec_record*
| where metadata_product = "Office 365" and !(isEmpty(device_ip_countryCode) OR device_ip_countryCode = "Unassigned" OR device_ip_countryCode = "US" OR toLowerCase(user_username) = "unknown") and !isNull(success) and success
| count by user_username, device_ip_countryCode
| order by _count

panels.title: Users that Successfully Logged in from 2+ Countries

queries.queryString:
_index=sec_record*
| where metadata_product = "Office 365" and !(isEmpty(device_ip_countryCode) OR device_ip_countryCode = "Unassigned" OR toLowerCase(user_username) = "unknown") and !isNull(success) and success
| count_distinct(device_ip_countryCode) by user_username
| where _count_distinct > 1
| order by _count_distinct

panels.title: User Account Lockouts - attempted logins on locked account for last 7 days

queries.queryString:
_index=sec_record*
| where metadata_product = "Office 365" and fields matches "*IdsLocked*"
| count by user_username

_index=sec_record*
| json field=_raw "Operation"
| where metadata_product = "Office 365" and (toLowerCase(Operation) matches "*dlp*" or toLowerCase(metadata_deviceEventId) matches "*dlp*")
| count, last(fields) as details by user_username, metadata_deviceEventid, Operation
| order by _count

panels.title: Distinct Days + Percentage of Logins by IP/User

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*o365* UserLoggedIn
| timeslice 1d
| json field=_raw "UserId" as user_username
| toLowerCase(user_username)
| where user_username matches "{{user_username}}"
| json field=_raw "ClientIP" as device_ip
| where device_ip matches "{{device_ip}}"
| lookup country_name, state, city from geo://location on ip=device_ip
| 1 as _accum
| count_distinct(_timeslice) as days_seen, count by user_username, device_ip, country_name, state, city
| total(_count) as total_logins by user_username
| total(_count) as logins_per_ip by user_username, device_ip
| (logins_per_ip/total_logins)*100 as pct_logins_by_ip
| fields - total_logins, logins_per_ip
| order by days_seen

panels.title: Distinct Days + Percentage of Events by UserAgent/User

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*o365* useragent
| timeslice 1d
| json field=_raw "UserId" as user_username nodrop
| toLowerCase(user_username)
| where user_username matches "{{user_username}}"
| json field=_raw "ClientIP" as device_ip nodrop
| where device_ip matches "{{device_ip}}"
| lookup country_name, state, city from geo://location on ip=device_ip
| json field=_raw "UserAgent" as user_agent
| count_distinct(_timeslice) as days_seen, count by user_username, user_agent, device_ip, country_name, state, city
| total(_count) as total_events by user_username
| total(_count) as events_per_user_agent by user_username, user_agent, device_ip
| (events_per_user_agent/total_events)*100 as pct_events_by_user_agent
| fields - total_events, events_per_user_agent
| order by days_seen

panels.title: Distinct Days + Percentage of Events by Operation

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*o365* Operation
| timeslice 1d
| json field=_raw "UserId" as user_username nodrop
| toLowerCase(user_username)
| where user_username matches "{{user_username}}"
| json field=_raw "ClientIP" as device_ip nodrop
| where device_ip matches "{{device_ip}}"
| lookup country_name, state, city from geo://location on ip=device_ip
| json field=_raw "Operation" as operation
| count_distinct(_timeslice) as days_seen, count by user_username, operation
| total(_count) as total_events by user_username
| total(_count) as events_per_operation by user_username, operation
| (events_per_operation/total_events)*100 as pct_events_by_operation
| fields - total_events, events_per_operation
| order by days_seen

_sourceCategory=*o365* UserLoggedIn
| timeslice 1d
| json field=_raw "UserId" as user nodrop
| toLowerCase(user)
| where user matches "{{user_username}}"
| json field=_raw "ClientIP" as src_ip nodrop
// Parse out the user & source ip address
// Create table listing successive logins by user
| _messagetime as login_time
| count BY login_time, user, src_ip
| sort BY user, +login_time
| ipv4ToNumber(src_ip) AS src_ip_decimal
| backshift src_ip_decimal BY user
| backshift login_time AS previous_login
| where !(isNull(_backshift)) // This filters on users with only a single login or the latest event per user & avoids 'null' error messages
// Convert the decimal back into an IP address
| decToHex(toLong(_backshift)) as src_ip_hex
| parse regex field=src_ip_hex "^(?<o1>[0-9A-Z]{2})(?<o2>[0-9A-Z]{2})(?<o3>[0-9A-Z]{2})(?<o4>[0-9A-Z]{2})"
| concat(hexToDec(o1), ".", hexToDec(o2), ".", hexToDec(o3), ".", hexToDec(o4)) as previous_src_ip
// A geo-lookup for each IP address
| lookup latitude AS lat1, longitude AS long1, country_name AS country_name1, state as state1 FROM geo://location ON ip=src_ip
| lookup latitude AS lat2, longitude AS long2, country_name AS country_name2, state as state2 FROM geo://location ON ip=previous_src_ip
| where !(isNull(lat1) OR isNull(lat2))
// Calculate the distance between a user's successive logins using the haversine formula
| haversine(lat1, long1, lat2, long2) AS distance_kms
// Calculate the speed a user would have to travel at in order to have done this
| (login_time - previous_login)/3600000 AS login_time_delta_hrs
| where !(login_time_delta_hrs=0)
| distance_kms/login_time_delta_hrs AS apparent_velocity_kph
| where apparent_velocity_kph > 0 // Filter out logins from the same IP
// Specify the impossible speed here (km/hr)
| 500 AS impossible_speed
| where apparent_velocity_kph > impossible_speed
// Clean it up for presentation
| concat(src_ip,", ",previous_src_ip) AS ip_addresses
| if(country_name1 <> country_name2,concat(country_name1,", ",country_name2),country_name1) AS countries
| if(state1 <> state2,concat(state1,", ",state2),state1) AS states
| fields user, ip_addresses, countries, distance_kms, login_time_delta_hrs, apparent_velocity_kph
| sort BY apparent_velocity_kph

panels.title: Allowed Connections to IPs on Threat List

queries.queryString:
_index=sec_record*
| json field=_raw "action"
| json field=_raw "device_name"
| json field=_raw "source_zone"
| where metadata_vendor matches "Palo Alto*" AND srcDevice_ip_isInternal AND !dstDevice_ip_isInternal AND action = "allow" AND listMatches matches "*threat*" AND listMatches matches "*column:DstIp*"
| count by device_name,
     srcDevice_ip,
     srcDevice_ip_location,
     source_zone,
     listMatches,
     dstDevice_ip,
     dstPort,
     dstDevice_ip_countryCode,
     dstDevice_ip_isp,
     dstDevice_ip_asnNumber
| order by _count

_index=sec_record*
| json field=_raw "threat_category"
| json field=_raw "severity"
| where metadata_vendor matches "Palo Alto*" and (severity = "low" or severity = "medium" or severity = "high" or severity = "critical")
| count by threat_category
| order by _count

_index=sec_record*
| json field=_raw "severity"
| where metadata_vendor matches "Palo Alto*" and (severity = "low" or severity = "medium" or severity = "high" or severity = "critical")
| count by severity
| order by _count

_index=sec_record*
| where metadata_vendor matches "Palo Alto*" and (severity = "low" or severity = "medium" or severity = "high" or severity = "critical") and !isEmpty(action)
| count by action
| order by _count

_index=sec_record*
| json field=_raw "severity"
| where metadata_vendor matches "Palo Alto*" and (severity = "high" or severity = "critical") and metadata_deviceEventId = "PALO_FW_THREAT"
| count by action,
  description,
  device_ip,
  dstDevice_ip,
  dstDevice_natIp,
  dstPort,
  file_basename,
  ipProtocol,
  severity,
  srcDevice_ip,
  srcDevice_natIp,
  srcPort,
  threat_name,
  user_username
| order by _count

_index=sec_record*
| json field=_raw "category" nodrop
| json field=_raw "device_name" nodrop
| json field=_raw "dg_hierarchy_1" nodrop
| json field=_raw "dg_hierarchy_2" nodrop
| json field=_raw "dg_hierarchy_3" nodrop
| json field=_raw "dg_hierarchy_4" nodrop
| json field=_raw "evidence" nodrop
| json field=_raw "generated_time" nodrop
| json field=_raw "object_id" nodrop
| json field=_raw "object_name" nodrop
| json field=_raw "source_ip" nodrop
| json field=_raw "sub_type" nodrop
| json field=_raw "username" nodrop
| json field=_raw "virtual_system" nodrop
| json field=_raw "virtual_system_id" nodrop
| json field=_raw "virtual_system_name" nodrop
| where metadata_vendor matches "Palo Alto*" and !(severity = "low" or severity = "informational") and metadata_deviceEventId = "PALO_FW_CORRELATION"
| count by description,
device_ip,
srcDevice_ip,
threat_name,
user_username,
category,
device_name,
dg_hierarchy_1,
dg_hierarchy_2,
dg_hierarchy_3,
dg_hierarchy_4,
evidence,
generated_time,
object_id,
object_name,
severity,
source_ip,
sub_type,
username,
virtual_system,
virtual_system_id,
virtual_system_name
| order by _count

_index=sec_record*
| where metadata_vendor = "Proofpoint" and metadata_product = "Targeted Attack Protection" AND !(toLowerCase(metadata_deviceEventId) = "message_blocked" or toLowerCase(metadata_deviceEventId) = "message_permitted") AND (threat_name = "spam" or threat_name = "phish" or threat_name = "malware")
| count by action,
  device_ip,
  email_sender,
  http_url,
  http_userAgent,
  srcDevice_ip,
  threat_name,
  threat_referenceUrl,
  timestamp,
  user_email,
  user_username
| order by _count

_index=sec_record*
| timeslice 1d
| where metadata_vendor = "Trend Micro"
| count by metadata_vendor, metadata_product, metadata_deviceEventId, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column metadata_vendor, metadata_product, metadata_deviceEventId

_index=sec_record*
| timeslice 1h
| where !isEmpty(user_username)
| where user_username matches "{{user_username}}"
| count by _timeslice, metadata_vendor, metadata_product
| transpose row _timeslice column metadata_vendor, metadata_product

_index=sec_record*
| where user_username matches "{{user_username}}"
| where metadata_deviceEventId = "Security-4624" or metadata_deviceEventId = "Security-4625"
| count by device_ip, device_ip_location, device_ip_countryCode, success
| order by _count

_index=sec_record*
| where user_username matches "{{user_username}}"
| where metadata_vendor = "Carbon Black"
| count by threat_name
| order by _count

_index=sec_record*
| where user_username matches "{{user_username}}"
| where metadata_vendor = "Linux"
| json field=_raw "process", "hostname", "src_ip"
| count by action, process, hostname, src_ip
| order by _count

_index=sec_record*
| where user_username matches "{{user_username}}"
| where metadata_vendor = "OpenSSH"
| json field=_raw "username", "port", "client"
| count by username, port, client
| order by _count

panels.title: Windows Event Trend by Event ID

queries.queryString:
_index=sec_record*
| timeslice 1d
| where metadata_vendor = "Microsoft" and metadata_product = "Windows"
| count by metadata_vendor, metadata_product, metadata_deviceEventId, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column metadata_vendor, metadata_product, metadata_deviceEventId

_index=sec_record*
| where metadata_vendor = "Microsoft" and metadata_product = "Windows" and user_username matches "*adm_*" AND metadata_deviceEventId = "Security-4724"
| count by user_username, device_hostname
| order by _count

panels.title: Users Added to Global Security Groups

queries.queryString:
_index=sec_record*
| json field=_raw "Computer" as computer
| json field=_raw "$['EventData.TargetUserName']" as target
| where metadata_vendor = "Microsoft" and metadata_product = "Windows" AND metadata_deviceEventId IN ("Security-4728", "Security-4732", "Security-4756")
| count by user_username, device_hostname, computer, target
| order by _count

_index=sec_record*
| json field=_raw "LogonType" as logontype
| where metadata_vendor = "Microsoft" and metadata_product = "Windows" AND metadata_deviceEventId IN ("Security-4624", "Security-4625") and logontype = "2" and user_username matches "*svc_*"
| count by user_username, device_hostname
| order by _count

_index=sec_record*
| where metadata_vendor = "Microsoft" and metadata_product = "Windows" AND metadata_deviceEventId = "Security-4740"
| count by user_username
| order by _count
